ai-ds2.1.1:1.2_0: At that time a wholesome mind has arisen in the sensuous world, or the object of a sensual object, or whatever sound object you’re associated with,

ai-ds2.1.1:113.2_0: At that time wisdom is the language of wisdom, clarity, conduct, wisdom, freedom, and the enlightenmentation of the Dhamma. At that time wisdom is the aggregate of wisdom.

ai-ds2.1.1:114.1_0: At that time what is the power of conscience?
ai-ds2.1.1:114.2_0: When there’s a time when it’s possible to undertake the bad, unskillful qualities of desire and aversion.
ai-ds2.1.1:114.3_0: At that time there is the strength of conscience.
ai-ds2.1.1:115.1_0: which is the power of prudence?
ai-ds2.1.1:115.2_0: Whenever they are prudent and prudent when it comes to acquiring conscience and prudence,
ai-ds2.1.1:115.3_0: At that time there is the strength of conscience.
ai-ds2.1.1:115.4_0: At that time there are these seven powers.
ai-ds2.1.1:117.2_0: At that time you’re not greedy, hateful, and delusion.
ai-ds2.1.1:117.3_0: At that time there is no greed.
ai-ds2.1.1:118.1_0: At that time what is non-doing?
ai-ds2.1.1:118.2_0: At that time without ill will, too, is a root of good will, and good will.
ai-ds2.1.1:118.3_0: At that time there is no hate.
ai-ds2.1.1:119.2_0: At that time people understand how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds.
ai-ds2.1.1:119.3_0: At that time there is no delusion;
ai-ds2.1.1:119.4_0: At that time there are three,
ai-ds2.1.1:120.1_0: at that time what is one contact?
ai-ds2.1.1:120.2_0: At that time the contact, touching of contact,
ai-ds2.1.1:120.3_0: at that time there is one contact,
ai-ds2.1.1:121.2_0: At that time with your mind happy pleasant feeling,
ai-ds2.1.1:122.3_0: and at that time there is one perception.
ai-ds2.1.1:123.2_0: At that time there is intention regarding intentional intentions:
ai-ds2.1.1:123.3_0: At that time there is one intention,
ai-ds2.1.1:124.1_0: at that time what is one-pointed mind?
ai-ds2.1.1:124.2_0: Whatever mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, and mind contact are given up.
ai-ds2.1.1:124.3_0: At that time this is the mind.
ai-ds2.1.1:125.1_0: at that time what is one-perception?
ai-ds2.1.1:125.2_0: At that time with your mind happy pleasant feeling,
ai-ds2.1.1:126.3_0: At that time there is one perception, there is one perception,
ai-ds2.1.1:127.1_0: at that time what is one component?
ai-ds2.1.1:127.2_0: If there is a vital condition for the faculty of faith, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity. Their mind is the power of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, wisdom, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-ds2.1.1:127.3_0: Or else, apart from any other phenomena apart from the maintaining of feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ds2.1.1:127.4_0: at that time there is a one component.
ai-ds2.1.1:128.1_0: at that time what is one-pointedness?
ai-ds2.1.1:128.2_0: Whatever mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, and mind contact are given up.
ai-ds2.1.1:128.3_0: at that time there is one man, there is one-pointedness.
ai-ds2.1.1:129.2_0: Whatever mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, and mind contact are given up.
ai-ds2.1.1:129.3_0: At that time this is the mind-made body.
ai-ds2.1.1:130.1_0: What is the faculty of mind?
ai-ds2.1.1:130.2_0: Whatever mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, and mind contact are given up.
ai-ds2.1.1:130.3_0: At that time there is the faculty of mind.
ai-ds2.1.1:131.1_0: At that time is a single mind-consciousness element?
ai-ds2.1.1:131.2_0: Whatever mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, and mind contact are given up.
ai-ds2.1.1:131.3_0: At that time this is the mind-consciousness element.
ai-ds2.1.1:132.1_0: At that time what is the one-place?
ai-ds2.1.1:132.2_0: The feelings constituent group, the perceptions constituent group, the (volitional) processes constituent group, the (volitional) processes constituent group:
ai-ds2.1.1:132.3_0: At that time there is a one-portion of the teaching.
ai-ds2.1.1:133.1_0: At that time what is the one-element?
ai-ds2.1.1:133.2_0: The feelings constituent group, the perceptions constituent group, the (volitional) processes constituent group, the (volitional) processes constituent group:
ai-ds2.1.1:133.3_0: At that time this exposition of the teaching is element.
ai-ds2.1.1:134.1_0: At that time, these and other things are not dependently originated,
ai-ds2.1.1:135.1_0: At that time there is a way of regarding the things that are strong, there is the basis of psychic power, the faculties, the five powers, the mind element, and feeling are stilled.
ai-ds2.1.1:135.2_0: At that time, these and other things are not dependently originated,
ai-ds2.1.1:136.2_0: The feelings constituent group, the perceptions constituent group, the aggregates constituent group, the consciousness constituent group.
ai-ds2.1.1:137.2_0: The feelings constituent group, the perceptions constituent group, the aggregates constituent group, the consciousness constituent group.
ai-ds2.1.1:138.1_0: What are the sense fields that are present?
ai-ds2.1.1:138.3_0: These are the six sense fields.
ai-ds2.1.1:139.1_0: At that time what are the elements?
ai-ds2.1.1:139.2_0: The mind element, the thought element,
ai-ds2.1.1:139.3_0: At that time there are the air element.
ai-ds2.1.1:141.1_0: What are the faculties that are definitive?
ai-ds2.1.1:141.2_0: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-ds2.1.1:142.1_0: At that time what is absorption?
ai-ds2.1.1:142.2_0: Placing the mind, keeping it connected, rapture, bliss, and unification of mind.
ai-ds2.1.1:143.2_0: Right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
ai-ds2.1.1:143.3_0: At that time this is a path.
ai-ds2.1.1:144.1_0: What are the powers that are strong?
ai-ds2.1.1:144.2_0: The powers of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-ds2.1.1:146.2_0: at that time there is contact,
ai-ds2.1.1:147.2_0: at that time there is feeling.
ai-ds2.1.1:148.2_0: and at that time there is perception.
ai-ds2.1.1:149.2_0: At that time there is intention,
ai-ds2.1.1:150.2_0: At that time this is their mind.
ai-ds2.1.1:152.2_0: At that time there is perception,
ai-ds2.1.1:153.1_0: At that time what is choice? ...
ai-ds2.1.1:153.2_0: at that time there is a (volitional) process expressed by choices.
ai-ds2.1.1:155.2_0: At that time there is a mind-made body.
ai-ds2.1.1:156.1_0: What is the faculty of mind? ...
ai-ds2.1.1:156.2_0: At that time there is the faculty of mind.
ai-ds2.1.1:157.2_0: At that time this is the mind-consciousness element.
ai-ds2.1.1:158.1_0: At that time what is the dimension of thoughts?
ai-ds2.1.1:158.2_0: The feelings constituent group, the perceptions constituent group, the (volitional) processes constituent group, the (volitional) processes constituent group:
ai-ds2.1.1:158.3_0: At that time there is a dimension of thoughts.
ai-ds2.1.1:159.1_0: At that time what is the nature of principle?
ai-ds2.1.1:159.2_0: The feelings constituent group, the perceptions constituent group, the (volitional) processes constituent group, the (volitional) processes constituent group:
ai-ds2.1.1:159.3_0: At that time this is the nature of the teaching.
ai-ds2.1.1:160.1_0: At that time, these and other things are not dependently originated,
ai-ds2.1.1:161.2_0: At whatever time a wholesome mind has arisen in the sensual realm, associated with knowledge, with intentions that are associated with knowledge,
ai-ds2.1.1:161.3_0: Or at that time they have no contact for them. ...
ai-ds2.1.1:162.2_0: While in a time of sensual pleasures is dominded, aroused, or a physical contact, when the mind is present, there is faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-ds2.1.1:162.3_0: At that time, these and other things are not dependently originated,
ai-ds2.1.1:162.4_0: These are skillful qualities that are skillful. ...”
ai-ds2.1.1:163.1_0: At that time, when there are four elements, there are three kinds of contact: one, two, three, four, five, four, five, six, seven, eight individuals.
ai-ds2.1.1:163.2_0: At that time, these and other things are not dependently originated,
ai-ds2.1.1:163.3_0: These are skillful qualities that are skillful. ...”
ai-ds2.1.1:164.1_0: at that time what is the volitions component?
ai-ds2.1.1:164.2_0: contact, feeling, perception, choices, and mind.
ai-ds2.1.1:164.3_0: Or else, apart from any other phenomena apart from the maintaining of feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ds2.1.1:164.4_0: at that time their choices are impediment.
ai-ds2.1.1:165.2_0: When a wholesome thought in the sensuous worlds has arisen in the formless realm. ...
ai-ds2.1.1:165.3_0: Or at that time they have no contact for them. ...
ai-ds2.1.1:166.2_0: While there is sensual pleasures that are skillful or unskillful. When the mind is observed by the variety of things, there is concentration through faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-ds2.1.1:166.3_0: At that time, these and other things are not dependently originated,
ai-ds2.1.1:167.1_0: at that time what is contact?
ai-ds2.1.1:167.2_0: At that time the contact, touching of contact,
ai-ds2.1.1:167.3_0: at that time there is contact,
ai-ds2.1.1:168.1_0: at that time what is feeling?
ai-ds2.1.1:168.2_0: At that time, because of the mind-consciousness element, mental phenomena don’t comprehend the mind element of self-existence, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind-contact.
ai-ds2.1.1:168.3_0: At that time there is feeling ...
ai-ds2.1.1:169.2_0: At that time they don’t comprehend the mind of others that is neither-pleasant-nor-pleasant feeling,
ai-ds2.1.1:169.3_0: At that time there’s a time of equanimity. ...
ai-ds2.1.1:170.2_0: At that time they don’t comprehend the mind of others that is neither-pleasant-nor-pleasant feeling,
ai-ds2.1.1:170.3_0: At that time there’s a equanimity faculty of equanimity. ...
ai-ds2.1.1:170.4_0: At that time, these and other things are not dependently originated,
ai-ds2.1.1:170.5_0: These are skillful qualities that are skillful. ...”
ai-ds2.1.1:171.1_0: At that time, when there are four elements, three fields, four elements are strong, five, three, four, five, four, five, sixty, and seven factors.
ai-ds2.1.1:171.2_0: At that time, these and other things are not dependently originated,
ai-ds2.1.1:171.3_0: These are skillful qualities that are skillful. ...”
ai-ds2.1.1:172.1_0: at that time what is the volitions component?
ai-ds2.1.1:172.2_0: contact, feeling, perception, choices, and mind.
ai-ds2.1.1:173.1_0: Or else, apart from any other phenomena apart from the maintaining of feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ds2.1.1:173.2_0: at that time their choices are impediment.
ai-ds2.1.1:174.2_0: When a wholesome thought in the sensuous worlds has arisen, it is associated with knowledge and intentions regarding sights.
ai-ds2.1.1:174.3_0: Or at that time they have no contact for them. ...
ai-ds2.1.1:175.2_0: While in a time of sensual pleasures is domain, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-ds2.1.1:175.3_0: At that time, these and other things are not dependently originated,
ai-ds2.1.1:175.4_0: These are skillful qualities that are skillful. ...”
ai-ds2.1.1:176.1_0: At that time, when there are four elements, there are three fields: four elements, five faculties, six, three, four, five, six, seven factors, eight individuals.
ai-ds2.1.1:176.2_0: At that time, these and other things are not dependently originated,
ai-ds2.1.1:176.3_0: These are skillful qualities that are skillful. ...”
ai-ds2.1.1:177.1_0: at that time what is the volitions component?
ai-ds2.1.1:177.2_0: contact, feeling, perception, choices, and mind.
ai-ds2.1.1:178.1_0: Or else, apart from any other phenomena apart from the maintaining of feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ds2.1.1:178.2_0: at that time their choices are impediment.
ai-ds2.1.1:179.2_0: When a wholesome thought in the sensuous worlds has arisen, it’s impossible to know a basis for knowledge with equanimity, and an excellent form connected with equanimity.
ai-ds2.1.1:179.3_0: Or at that time they have no contact for them. ...
ai-ds2.1.1:179.5_0: (and) like this is the eighth (first) mind.
ai-ds2.1.1:179.6_0: (These eight) wholesome minds of the sensual realm,
